bluetoothLowEnergyIsSupported

public static boolean bluetoothLowEnergyIsSupported(Context inContext)
Check if context supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)

Parameters:
inContext - Context object
Returns:
true if supports, false otherwise

uniqueIDForBeacon

public static java.lang.String uniqueIDForBeacon(SBBeacon beacon)
Returns unique identifier for beacon argument.

It is a combination of ProximityUuid, major and minor values of beacon.

Parameters:
beacon - SBBeacon object
Returns:
unique identifier

uniqueIDForRegion

public static java.lang.String uniqueIDForRegion(SBRegion region)
Returns unique identifier for region argument.

It is a combination of ProximityUuid, major and minor values of region.

Parameters:
region - SBRegion object
Returns:
unique identifier

majorForBeaconId

public static java.lang.Integer majorForBeaconId(java.lang.String beaconId)
Returns major part from beacon identifier

Parameters:
beaconId - unique identifier generated by SBUtils.uniqueIDForBeacon() method
Returns:
major value or null if invalid beaconId

minorForBeaconId

public static java.lang.Integer minorForBeaconId(java.lang.String beaconId)
Returns minor part in beacon identifier

Parameters:
beaconId - unique identifier generated by SBUtils.uniqueIDForBeacon() method
Returns:
minor value or null if invalid beaconId

englishNameForProximity

public static java.lang.String englishNameForProximity(SBBeacon.Proximity proximity)
Get english text for proximity argument

Eq. "Far" for Proximity.FAR, "Near" for Proximity.NEAR, "Immediate" for Proximity.IMMEDIATE and "Unknown" for Proximity.UNKNOWN

Parameters:
proximity -
Returns:
english text for proximity argument
